sumitha්ra da silwasha්ri lankawa, palasthina janathawa wenuwen itu karana lada karya bharaya pilibandawa palasthina janadhipathi mahamud abbas mahatha sha්ri lanka janadhipathithuma wetha siya kruthagnyathawa pala kara atha.palasthina deshaye manushika ayithiwasikam pilibandawa 37 wasarak pura eksath jathinge sanwidhanayata thorathuru wartha kerena kamituwe sabhapathi dhuraya daramin sha්ri lankawa itu kala sewawada mehidi agayimata lak wiya.dedina nila sancharayak sandaha ikuth 09 da sha්ri lankawata pamini palasthina janadhipathi mahamud abbas mahatha saha sha්ri lanka janadhipathithuma athara pawathi nila sakachchawedi ohu me bawa pa්rakasha kota atha.sha්ri lankawa palasthinayata labadenu labana thakshanika ha adhyapanika pahasukam pilibandawa da mehidi derate niyojithayin athara pulul washayen sakachcha wiya.
owunta palamukotama buddhagama yanu kumakda yanna pilibandawa etharam awabodhayak natha.

eprayimge senankaye senpathiya ammihudge puth elishama wiya. 23 manassege gothrayata ayath wuwange senankaye senpathiya pedashurge puth gamaliyel wiya. 24 benjaminge gothrayata ayath wuwange senankaye senpathiya gideyonige puth abidan wiya.

mema thaththwaya yatathema hitlar sadahana arabaya eksath jathika paksha samajikayo hitapu aarakshaka lekamwarayata digin digatama pahara gasuha.ek awasthawaka di paksha nayaka, agamathi ranil wikramasinha, hitlarge sahodaraya yayi mahinda rajapakshawa hadunwadunne ya.eyata prathicharayak lesa, mahinda rajapaksha perala wikramasinhawa hadunwadunne pol potge sahodaraya lesaya.pol pot yanu 1975 - 1979 samaye kambodiyawa palanaya kala kamaruj rajaye deshapalana nayakayaya.ohuge palanaya yatathe sagathayen, ghathanayen, rogabadha waladimen, pamana ikmawa wada kirimen miya giya kambodiya jathikayan sankhyawa laksha 15k - 20k pamana weyayi ganan bala thibe.ohu yatathe pawathwagena giya ekthara radawum madhyasthanayak, ehi radawiyan 20,000k athurin 7 deneku pamanak diwi galawaganimata samathwa thibima nisawenma kuprakataya.ekama samaja thalayak sahitha samajawadi samajayak nirmanaya kirimata kamaruj rajaya daru uthsahaye di, buddhimathun, nagarikayan, wiyatnama jathikayan, rajaye sewakayan saha aagamika nayakayan, owunge pradhana goduru wiya.rajapaksha saha wikramasinha athara wadan harambaaya gala giye elesaya.
tabuta passe blog awakashaye dakapu hondama liyanna umbaayi..

eheth ewan yahapath wathawaranayaka di pawa kisidu sanwardhana kriyawaliyak aarambha kirimata eksath jathika pakshaya asamath wi ya.eksath jathika pakshaya ha janatha wimukthi peramuna hora hawule eeniya nirpakshika janadhipathi apekshaka wishramika janaral waraya jayagrahanaya kalahoth ohu ge aarthika prathipaththiya wanne e. ja. pa. aarthika prathipaththiya bawa prakata puuwathpath sakachchawaka di ohu prakasha kale ya.ohu jayagrahanaya kalahoth ohu dena boru porondu itu kirima kese wethath, methek kara gena aa aarthika sanwardhana kriyawaliya wada karana janathawa ge jayagrahanayath aapasu harawana bawa nam itha pahadili ya.dina kihipayak deshapalanaya kota prajathanthrawadaya gana katha karana janaralwaraya balayata path kalahoth rate prashna walata ohu wisandum soyanawa aththe aagnyaadayaka palanayak magin bawa awadharanayen penwa diya yuthu ma ya.enisa mewara mathiwaranaya prajathanthrawadayath aagnyaadayakathwayath athara satanak bawa pahadiliwa pene.
